subject: Re: Mayo Hardware Website - Logo Updates

full_threads.body:
Hi Bonnie,

Confirming we have updated the brands page.

Hi Joel,

I actually can't see Purina Total Care or Kamado Joe on my end, but those URLs are fine. Also ok to direct to Aurus IG profile.

Do you know why this is?





Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager

Hi Bonnie,

Thanks again for sending through the link.

Confirming that it's been updated on our end.

We also took a look at the other brands the doesn't have a links and here’s what we found:
  • Aurus – We couldn’t find a website, just their Instagram profile. Let us know if you'd like us to link to that.
  • Kamadojoe – Updated to kamadojoe.com
  • TotalCare – Updated to purina.com.au/total-care

All sorted on our end, just give us a shout if you’d like us to tweak anything else!

Hi Joel,

Thanks for that.

There is just one missing. Please add ATG - https://www.atg-glovesolutions.com/

Thanks

done with this:
@joel @joy pls check. thanks

hey @joy passing to you now

Developer in-charge would be Cindy but I think Glen can do this 🙏

Hi Allie,

Thanks for your work on this. Confirming we are happy with the layout of the brands page.

Lastly, can you please link each brand to their respective website as per the spreadsheet attached? If any brands have been skipped, this is because there isn't a website available.

I have also noted that we are displaying both the new and old Century Springs logos on the page - these can be found under 'Hardware & Tools'. Can you please remove the old logo.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Hi Bonnie,

The new page is now up on staging and ready for you to review:
https://mayohardware.kinsta.cloud/brands-copy/

Let us know what you think when you’ve had a chance to take a look. We're more than happy to jump in and make any tweaks if needed.

Looking forward to your feedback!

Hi Bonnie,

Our sincere apologies for the delay in getting back to you.

Just an update: the structure of the proposed layout isn’t possible with our current grid builder due to a few limitations.

That said, we’re actively working on an alternative approach that’ll get us much closer to the layout you had in mind.

We’ll keep you posted and let you know as soon as the updated version is ready to review.

Let me know if you have any questions in the meantime, always happy to help!
